name: Heritage Insurance Holdings, Inc.
description: Heritage Insurance Holdings, Inc. is a property and casualty insurance holding company based in the United States. Founded in 2012 and headquartered in Tampa, Florida, Heritage offers a range of insurance products focused primarily on residential homeowners insurance. The company aims to provide affordable and comprehensive coverage while maintaining a commitment to customer service and claims handling. Heritage operates through its subsidiaries, which include Heritage Property & Casualty Insurance Company and other related entities. The company has established a robust distribution network, utilizing both independent agents and direct-to-consumer channels to reach its clients. Heritage is known for its innovative approach to underwriting and risk management, leveraging advanced technology to enhance its operational efficiency and improve customer experience. As part of its mission, Heritage seeks to create sustainable value for its shareholders while supporting the communities it serves through various initiatives. The company continues to expand its market presence across the southeastern United States, driven by a strategic focus on growth and profitability in the dynamic insurance landscape.

faq.answer: Heritage offers homeowners insurance, flood insurance, windstorm insurance, and commercial property insurance.
